changes.description: Implemented cross-platform color tokens with WCAG AA compliance for dark mode
Added bubble-level/inclinometer functionality to iOS measurement tools
Configured ARCoreMeasure in settings.gradle.kts and established module structure
Enabled Git LFS for USDZ assets and other binary files
Integrated RoomPlan neutral fork via Swift Package Manager
Added SmartSnap-iOS dependency for enhanced scan accuracy
Finalized CI configuration for v5.0-rc1-gold release

releaseNotes: This gold release candidate finalizes the cross-platform color token system, adds bubble-level functionality, integrates RoomPlan and SmartSnap modules, and ensures proper CI/CD pipeline configuration with automated testing.
